660240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Online Gaming Figure Flats (Token Pack)
660240.description:
This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of heroes and monsters for your Rippers games.Included among the huge array of figures are almost every monster found in the miniatures or roleplaying version of this great spookily Savage Setting.
This product contains over 200 tokens for use with Rippers. There are multiple tokens for all tokens (close-ups and full figure), and addition tokens for creatures of varying sizes.
File List: Rippers token files
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
